issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
Can't debug commonjs module installed in to folder /modules/commonjs.
As result blank page with message "Source not found" and "Edit Source Lookup Path...".
I tried to choose folder but it did not help.
fields.summary: Appcelerator Studio. Can't debug commonjs module due "Source not found"

comments.body: Hello, Can you provide the module that you are using?. Also please provide the CLI, Titanium SDK version, Platform, Node version, and operating system information. Thank you.

Ti.SDK 5.0.2, Android/Genymotion 4.2.2, node 0.12.7, appc 5.0.4-2, Alloy

Host OS: Mac OS X
OS Version: 10.10.5
OS Arch: x86_64

JRE Version: 1.7.0_79
JRE Vendor: Oracle Corporation
JRE Home: /Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/jdk1.7.0_79.jdk/Contents/Home/jre

Appcelerator Studio Version: 4.3.2.201510020431

Test code
{code:javascript}
var Factory = require('com.falkolab.imagecache');
Factory('123');
{code}

Can't attach module to this issue. Please use external link https://yadi.sk/d/zm-31gvNjzEns

Hi , 
We tested this issue.  We get this behaviour  only for *com.falkolab.imagecache* module , but any other common js module such as {{(ti.googleanalytics , ti.cloud)}} is working fine on debug mode.  

*Environment*
{code}
Operating System
  Name                        = Mac OS X
  Version                     = 10.10.5
  Architecture                = 64bit
  # CPUs                      = 4
  Memory                      = 8589934592
Node.js
  Node.js Version             = 0.10.37
  npm Version                 = 1.4.28
Titanium CLI
  CLI Version                 = 5.0.5
Titanium SDK
  SDK Version                 = 5.0.2.GA
  SDK Path                    = /Users/Raju/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/5.0.2.GA
  Target Platform             = android
{code}

Thanks
And why it not working for *com.falkolab.imagecache* module?
[~falko] - Good question. We will investigate this further.
Its module bugs. I also tested sample module its working good. It's not Titanium SDK related issues.
